job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Apple Online Store
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApple Online Store is looking for a highly motivated senior software engineer to join the Apple Online Store Engineering team You will deliver projects aimed at improving the hugely successful Apple Online Stores ecommerce experience and features  wwwapplecomshopbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brThe ideal candidate for this role will demonstrate the following characteristics and experiencebrbr5  10 years Software EngineerDeveloper experiencebrbrProgramming in Java or other OOO Programming languages with deep understanding of OOO concepts and experience in Spring or other DI frameworksbrbrDevelop highvolume performing multithreaded highly scalable reliable and distributed web services and applicationsbrbrDemonstrated expertise in Industry standard encryption methods systems security and compliancebrbrDemonstrated expertise in distributed message based architecture and noSQL data designbrbrKnowledge and experience with serviceoriented architecture microservices and API designbrbrExpert knowledge of computer science with understanding of data structures algorithms and software designbrbrDemonstrated ability to achieve stretch goals in a highly innovative and fast paced environmentbrbrStrong leadership abilities in driving operational excellence and best engineering practicesbrbrbrWere looking for a hardworking and passionate person to join this amazing team if you feel this is you wed love to hear from youbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brWe are looking for a self starting upbeat individual with excellent written and interpersonal skills who is a phenomenal teammate but not afraid to question assumptions and take initiative brbrAs part of the AOS Payments and Order Engineering team your responsibilities include building high throughput high performance highly scalable and reliable web services and applications that powers the Apple Online Store in SOA design working closely with other applications engineering team and interacting with product design content QA and many other groups to lead and deliver world class ecommerce experience in an exciting fastpaced environmentbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelorsMasters degree in Computer Science or ElectricalElectronics Engineeringbrbr brRole Number 200250913brbr
